overview:
Travlin McCormack is the Chief Technology Officer of Internships, LLC., In this role he is responsible for overseeing all technical aspects of the organization, including product development, infrastructure management, system integrations, and vendor selection and management .

Immediately prior to joining Internships, Travlin was the CTO of Slingshot Labs, NewsCorpâ€™s Web 2.0 incubator. Travlin oversaw the creation of sites ranging from celebrity gossip to events invitation to dating. These were all built with a focus on creating reusable technology to be leveraged across the incubator.

Prior to Slingshot, Travlin has held multiple management positions in technology for Fortune 500 companies, government offices, mid-sized organizations and fledgling startups. He has built and led development teams working both domestically and abroad in India and Russia for companies such as AIG, MySpace, Maersk/SeaLand, Korn/Ferry and San Diego County.

Travlin has experience leading teams utilizing development platforms including .Net, LAMP and Java. He has overseen departments and personnel implementing solutions using technologies such as MS SQLServer, MySQL, Oracle, NetApp, 3Par, EMC, Akamai, Citrix, F5, and Siebel.

Travlin holds a B.S. degree from San Diego State University, with dual concentrations in Information Technology and Sociology.
